Body: On my Nexus 7 2013 razor device I just returned to stock 5.1 after using CM, and wanted to install 5.1.1 OTA. When clicked install, it just restarted to TWRP - but I couldn't update anything. That's why I reverted to the stock 5.1 recovery - but sideloading still fails on the following:file "/system/bin/install-recovery.sh" doesn't have any of expected sha1 sums; checking cachefailed to stat "/cache/saved.file": No such file or directoryhow can I restore this cache file?
Title: OTA not installing: /cache/saved.file missing

history.Text: On my Nexus 7 2013 razor device I just returned to stock 5.1 after using CM, and wanted to install 5.1.1 OTA. When clicked install, it just restarted to TWRP - but I couldn't update anything. That's why I reverted to the stock 5.1 recovery - but sideloading still fails on the following:    file "/system/bin/install-recovery.sh" doesn't have any of expected sha1 sums; checking cache    failed to stat "/cache/saved.file": No such file or directoryhow can I restore this cache file?
